body: Kinda strange plot premise, since we know that THIS isn't necessary for Saber to remain in the world. UBW Good End shows that Rin+Shirou together can keep Saber from disappearing so he shouldn't need the entire city to power her, just Rin (for anime only people, that was a second ending for UBW where Rin realises Shirou cares a lot for Saber, and she sees a chance to force Shirou off the Archer path using that (she is also sexually attracted to Saber, admits it in the Fate Path). She keeps the contract active after the Grail shuts down, using her mana as the anchor and battery that keeps Saber incarnated. As she alone isn't quite enough, Shirou has to stay with them both to provide "mana" to her and Saber regularly, stopping him from going off on the quest that makes him Archer)

Hey Siri, why is Gen Z the most depressed generation?

Have been long since I have gotten hurt by a doujinshi. But this time, to be honest, it did it. My heart made a «crack!» before Saber's suicide. Personally, I think this ending to be worth to be considered as a Bad End in the original VN. At least, this is my mere opinion.
There's no pregnancy here dammit, only stomach deformation
I... I'm confused on how I'm feeling

Hi everyone, It's Ian from forgottenweapons.com and i'm here to briefly review this doujinshi. This is a well rounded doujinshi is not that unique as i did expect when i first saw the tags. The problem, but in the same time the benefit of this one is that it may be a modern production doujinshi with modern standards but it doesn't try anything new. Its the classic tentacle rape using the old, but not outdated by any standards, fate series.
I have to give this one a 3/5, again, a solid formula, but i would like to see more creativity and ingenuity in the future.
Pass, if only it's not saber...... Shame
